basic.empty_tab_nav: There are no tabs to display

patterns.unavailable_info:
You can no longer open this pattern from this app. This could be because you've deleted the file on your phone, or because you've removed the app's access to the file from your phone's settings.

If you still have the pattern, try deleting the entry from this list and adding it again.

wips.stopwatch_limit_message: Wow, 1000 hours on this project. That's cool. Unfortunately, I did set a 3-digit limit for the hours, so write that big number down elsewhere because the stopwatch will reset the moment you dismiss this alert.
wips.empty_wip_nav: There are no WIPs to display

shopping_list.item_details_hint: Make sure it is several yards long, that labyrinth is quite big

kofi.title: My Ko-fi
kofi.message:
Hi! I made this app for myself because I could never find the right tool for my needs. I then put it out into the world for free for others like me who might need it.
If you are one of these others, and you'd like to thank me (in a monetary manner), please consider donating to my Ko-fi.
